name: Granny's Secret
description:
You are a journalist exploring mysteries of your small city. Recently, most suspicious citizens have been visiting old granny from across the road. You decided to visit her and inspect the house. It looks innocent at first, but everything gets more interesting when you get deeper in her basement.

Press WASD to move

Press Shift to do small dash

Press B to get in throwing stance and throw a pebble and distract your enemies. Press B second time to exit throwing stance.

Press Esc to respawn

Hide from suspicious cultists and find the truth!
